means: 夏洛特敦（加拿大东南部港市）

sentence.Network_cn: 夏洛特敦协定已成为历史。

sentence.Network_en: And so for the next year Anne lived in Charlottetown and went to college every day.
sentence.Network_cn: 因此在下一年里安妮就住在了夏洛特小镇上,准备每天都去上学.

means.word_mean: 1. the provincial capital and largest city of Prince Edward Island

auth_sentence.content: The first stop for Will and Kate will be Charlottetown.
